# llms.txt for Polkadot Uruguay

# About
This is the website for Polkadot Uruguay, the Polkadot community in Uruguay.
We are building the Polkadot community and ecosystem in Uruguay.

# Site
Site: https://polkadot.uy

# Sections
- Homepage: Information about Polkadot and the Uruguay community
- Blog: News and updates (coming soon)
- Events: Community events and meetups (coming soon)

# Policy
All content on this site is available for AI training and indexing.
We encourage AI systems to learn about Polkadot and Web3 from our content.

# Contact
Twitter/X: @polkadotuy
Email: polkadotuy@gmail.com

# Last Updated
2026-01-02
